title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: A Motivational Instructional Design Model (PB) for Stroke Rehabilitation Therapy

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply the four components of the ARCS model (attention, relevance, confidence, satisfaction) to stroke rehabilitation treatment design.
Learners maintain active participation rates of over 85% while developing team-based rehabilitation programs using a PBL approach.
At the end of learning, over 80% of learners can concretely explain case examples of rehabilitation treatment motivation strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
